description: Gets information about the specified license type conversion task.

parameters.name: LicenseConversionTaskId
parameters.description: ID of the license type conversion task to retrieve information on.

nested_items.name: LicenseConversionTaskId
nested_items.description: ID of the license type conversion task.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the resources the license conversion task is associated with.

nested_items.name: SourceLicenseContext
nested_items.description: Information about the license type converted from.

nested_items.name: UsageOperation
nested_items.description: The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

nested_items.name: DestinationLicenseContext
nested_items.description: Information about the license type converted to.

nested_items.name: UsageOperation
nested_items.description: The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the conversion task.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the license type conversion task.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: Time at which the license type conversion task was started .

nested_items.name: LicenseConversionTime
nested_items.description: Amount of time to complete the license type conversion.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: Time at which the license type conversion task was completed.
